info.name: Sable Armor
info.description: Armor made by or for the members of the Order of the Sable Cross
info.author: JCDM

description.p: A small clear crystal orb the size of a man's fist. Has 1d4 charges (max 4), and regains a charge when set under the light of the moon for 1 hour. Spending a charge allows the user to cast the Scry spell.
A small, well-crafted amulet that when worn causes heads to turn and suggestions to be more impactful. Gives a +1 to Charisma and proficiency wtih Persuasion checks where the target can see you.

Any text the quill is traced over will glow a fluorescent tone of yellow. A character attuned to the quill can study, translate, or interpret texts (including spellbooks) which have been illuminated in half the time.

A clear purple gem is set into an engraved stone oval, which is in turn attached to a simple leather thread. When worn, this amulet grants the wearer 10 feet of truesight (10 ft radius). Does not require attunement, but if the wearer is not accustomed to truesight, will cause 1d12 hours of disoritenation after being put on.

A drow-crafted cloak that protects the wearer from the effects of sunlight. While wearing this cloak, a creature with sunlight sensitivity suffers no effect from being in sunlight *except* for when the sun is directly overhead (noon +/- 1 hr).
Additionally, once per day, the first time the wearer of this cloak would drop to 0 HP as a result of taking damage, they instead drop to 1 HP. Recharges each day at dawn.

This white gold ring is set with a large, heart shaped ruby. While wearing the ring, you gain +2 to Constitution. When using healing magic or items, if you roll a 1 or 2 on a healing roll, it becomes a 3.

This plain steel ring is engraved with a symbol of a greatshield. Has 2 charges, and regains all charges at dawn. As a bonus action, the wearer can speak a commad phrase and gain the effects of Lesser Blade Ward. When Lesser Blade Ward is active, the wearer has resistance to piercing and slashing damage.

This simple silver band has a crest shaped like a hawk carrying a fox-like creature in it's talons. This is a signet ring of House Montrell from the city of Honk in the kingdom of K'Varn.
Allows the user to cast the Entangle spell once/day.

This wand has 5 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and speak the word "Trick" or the word "Treat" while pointing it at a target within 90 ft. If the word "Trick" was spoken, roll a d6 and consult the Trick table. If the word "Treat" was spoken, roll a d6 and consult the Treat table. The user is unaware of which result was cast unless immediately obvious. The wand regains 1d4+1 expended charges each day at dawn and always fully recharges after a full moon.

Trick 1.) A ferret shows up on the next night and steals 1d4 gold from the target and brings it to you. The ferret then disappears. 2.) The target is cursed for the next 24 hours. While under this curse, the target is charged twice as much for alcoholic beverages. 3.) The target is cursed for the next 24 hours. While under this curse, the target somehow manages to burn any food they try to cook. 4.) The target is cursed for the next 24 hours. While under this curse, small wildlife creatures are afraid of the target. 5.) The target is cursed for the next 24 hours. While under this curse, all coins look like copper to the target. 6.) The target is cursed for the next 24 hours. While under this curse, the target is struck by the overwhelming need to itch in locations that are unreachable by them.

Treat 1.) The target is blessed for the next 24 hours. While under this blessing, a small sprite follows the target and will occasionally point out hidden objects. 2.) Five pieces of chocolate appear in the target's bags. When eaten they restore 1 hit point. 3.) The target is blessed for the next 24 hours. While under this blessing, the target has battle music that accompanies them in any conflict. 4.) The target is blessed for the next 24 hours. While under this blessing, they smells great to members of the opposite sex. 5.) The target is blessed for the next 24 hours. While under this blessing, whenever the target deals a killing blow against an enemy, 10 silver pieces explode from the body. 6.) The target is blessed for the next 24 hours. While under this blessing, rain cannot fall on the target, it simply glances down alongside an invisible shield and they stay nice and dry.

This item is carved from a piece of wood to give the wearer the appearance of a frog. While attuned to this item, you find a bag containing 2d4 + 2 chocolates under your pillow every morning when you wake up. These restore 1 hit point when eaten. Additionally, fireflies are drawn to you at night and will light your camps and flash brightly when potentially dangerous creatures approach.
